thread.section_title: eUKhost Ltd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eUKhost Ltd | www.eukhost.com | 5 of 18
thread.title: Pete Sears
thread.title_full: eUKhost Ltd reviewed by Pete Sears

author: Pete Sears
title: Pete Sears
text: Absolutely excellent support from Arnold K, Urbis? and others; but most of the issues I have had to use the support service for have ultimately been eUKhost's fault, so I can't give the company 5 stars overall. Having said that, i'd rather have occasional issues fixed well, than very occasional problems not fixed properly, or at all. So I am a happy customer.
